main.bio: I am a Software Test Engineer with a passion for identifying and solving problems which drives my desire to learn. I have experience with manual and automated testing for both hardware and software. I specialize in Python and Bash scripting, but I like to use the right tool for the job when I can. Feel free to reach out through my email or LinkedIn!

resume.skillmessage: Here are the technologies that I've used at work and in projects

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Electrical Engineering

work.title: Software Test Engineer
descriptions: Create, maintain, and execute automated and manual test procedures for Linux based aircraft antenna systems
Develop Python and Bash scripts to automate tasks that will verify system behavior based on specifications
Drove development in test automation by demonstrating the use of Robot Framework to software team leads
Removed the need for engineers to manually log test results by integrating Robot Framework with TestRail
Reduced time to verify RESTful responses by 50% with greater accuracy by automating the process
Responsible for reproducing and troubleshooting customer issues for major aerospace companies

work.title: Software Integration Test Engineer
descriptions: Conducted end-to-end tests on Inflight Entertainment systems to verify functionality prior to software build release
Troubleshooted internal and customer facing software issues on Linux based embedded systems
Created automation scripts using Linux commands and internal tools
Generated system configuration database files according to wiring diagrams and customer requirements

work.title: Engineering Intern
descriptions: Ran stress tests for Ethernet devices against various cable lengths and temperature environments
Operated oscilloscopes, network analyzers, and other electrical equipment to verify device performance

volunteer_work.title: Open Source Contributor
descriptions: Published a JavaScript program to freeCodeCamp’s Curriculum Expansion project to teach users the purpose and the methodology of unit testing through step by step instruction and hands on implementations
Worked with a software engineer from freeCodeCamp to understand their need and to provide a related project
Recognized by the founder of freeCodecamp as a Codebase Top Contributor in 2020

projects.title: freeCodeCamp Testing Lesson
projects.description: A JavaScript program to teach Unit Testing with Jest and Chai for freeCodeCamp’s new curriculum

projects.title: Recipe Viewer
projects.description: Website that parses recipes from popular recipe websites and presents it in a mobile friendly way

projects.title: Budgeting Application
projects.description: Website to categorize transactions when posted using the Plaid API and Web Push Notifications

projects.title: Pizza Website
projects.description: Website that allows users to order menu items and admins to update menu

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: Single page application that allows users to talk to others in a channel utilizing Flask's Socket Library

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Single page application that allows users to view my projects and work history
